response.overview: This film documents Mr Zhang Xiangqian, one of the three major cases of alien contact in China. He claims to have been taken by aliens to live on an alien planet for a month in 1985 and gained extraterrestrial knowledge. Upon his return to Earth, he taught himself maths and physics and claimed to have written the Unified Field Theory. Despite the fact that much of his correspondence was returned, he continued to insist. We visited and filmed him with scepticism and found that he did have a deep knowledge of physics and mathematics. The film leaves it up to the viewer to determine the authenticity of his experience.
response.title: I Went to an Alien Planet
